title: Population density point at Q, 5 answer options 2

content.description:
For following group of question first study the description of the diagram and then choose the one best answer to each question following it and fill in the corresponding oval on the answer sheet.
The graph below illustrates a logistic growth curve for a population of Euglena.
content.question: The population would be most likely to remain at the level shown at Q under which of the following conditions?

choices.label: The population size is well below its carrying capacity.

skill.text: 1.C: Explain biological concepts and processes in applied contexts.
